name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】ねぽらぼ学園 ☆5周年記念！！輝く学寮祭☆【#ねぽらぼ5周年学祭3Dライブ】 [-7fWewjcygo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Stylized 3D intro sequence featuring character introductions and credits for the 'Nepolabo Academy' 5th Anniversary Live.
A visual novel style dialogue scene set in a student dormitory room where the four members discuss their upcoming performance.

subtitles.original: ここはねぽらぼ学園！部活もクラスも違うけど、ねねたち同じ学生寮に住んでるんだ！
subtitles.english: This is Nepolabo Academy! We're in different clubs and classes, but we all live in the same dorm!

subtitles.original: ふざけて、笑って、時々喧嘩して。でも集まると、なんか落ち着く。
subtitles.english: We goof around, laugh, and fight sometimes. But when we're together, it's just so relaxing.

subtitles.original: 今日も談話室、賑やか。誰かの声が聞こえるだけで、安心するんだよね。
subtitles.english: The common room is lively again today. Just hearing someone's voice puts me at ease.

subtitles.original: この場所で、私たちだけの学園生活を作るなんて、楽しそうでワクワクする。
subtitles.english: Creating our very own school life in this place... sounds fun and exciting.

subtitles.original: さあ、私たちの、輝く青春が、始まる！
ねぽらぼ学園 ☆5周年記念！！輝く学寮祭☆
subtitles.english: Nepolabo Academy: 5th Anniversary!! The Radiant Dormitory Festival!

subtitles.original: 今日は学寮祭。生徒会が中心になって開催する、夏の一大イベント！
subtitles.english: Today is the Dormitory Festival. It's a huge summer event organized primarily by the student council!

subtitles.original: 会長からの頼みで、急遽ねぽらぼで出し物を考えることになったんだけど――
subtitles.english: At the student council president's request, we had to come up with a performance for Nepolabo at the last minute, but...

subtitles.original: 何も考えられてなーーーい!!!!
subtitles.english: We haven't thought of anything at aaaall!!!!

subtitles.original: やばいよ…気づいたら、もう当日だよ〜〜〜！
subtitles.english: This is bad... before I knew it, the day had already arrived!

subtitles.original: だから言ったじゃん、もっと早く集まって決めようって。
subtitles.english: See, I told you! We should have gotten together and decided sooner.

subtitles.original: いや〜、なんとかなるって思ってたんだけどな〜（笑）
subtitles.english: Well, I thought it would just work itself out somehow (laughs).

subtitles.original: うぅ…これはマズい…変なことやったら、会長になんて言われるか……
subtitles.english: Ugh... this is not good. If we do something weird, what will the president say...?

subtitles.original: やめなー！！当日に断れるわけないでしょ！
subtitles.english: Don't do that!! There's no way you can cancel on the day of!

subtitles.original: 大丈夫大丈夫、ラミちゃんならきっと許してくれるって♪
subtitles.english: It's okay, it's okay. If it's Lamy-chan, she'll surely forgive us.
